item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
ClickSend Logo ClickSend is a global leader in business communication solutions. Our reputation is built on technical expertise, industry experience, quality support and service reliability. From bulk marketing to mission-critical solutions, if you need a business messaging provider, you’ve come to the right place. Source
You can download theClickSendlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

<! [CDATA[
Cloze Logo Heading into a meeting? Cloze tells you exactly where you left off — with the context from Evernote, email, calls, social, documents and past meetings for every attendee. Source
You can download theClozelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.description: Heading into a meeting? Cloze tells you exactly where you left off — with the context from Evernote, email, calls, social, documents and past meetings for every attendee. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Stride Logo Stride was a cloud-based team business communication and collaboration tool, launched by Atlassian on 7 September 2017 to replace the cloud-based version of HipChat. Stride software was available to download onto computers running Windows, Mac or Linux, as well as Android, iOS smartphones, and tablets. Source
You can download theStridelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Stride
item.description: Stride was a cloud-based team business communication and collaboration tool, launched by Atlassian on 7 September 2017 to replace the cloud-based version of HipChat. Stride software was available to download onto computers running Windows, Mac or Linux, as well as Android, iOS smartphones, and tablets. Source
